descriptionHtml:
[size=6]                                                        [color=#00ff00]ZAKIYA  [/color]    [/size]                                                                                                                 

 [size=4][color=#f1c232]Players home.  [/color]  [/size]              


To get to [color=#00ff00]ZAKIYA[/color] open map see pics for location then teleport there. 


To get a good idea of [color=#00ff00]ZAKIYA[/color] look through the pics.   

[color=#00ff00]ZAKIYA[/color] has manniquins, weapon racks, soil for planting, tanning rack forge smelter ETC.

 I have tested the navmesh with a follower and encountered no problems.


[color=#00ff00][size=5]Requirements[/size]:[/color]          Dawnguard.Hearthfire.Dragonborn.


[color=#00ff00][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]          Just download with Nexus mod manger, Mod organizer or manual,if you want to install it manually,                                                                                                              then you have to extract it into your data file for Skyrim.

[color=#00ff00][size=5]Unistallation:[/size] [/color]        Just untick in mod manger or mod organzier or delete the files you manually installed.


[color=#00ff00][size=5]CREDITS:[/size][/color]                 [color=#00ff00] [size=5]Many thanks to.[/size][size=4]
